刺.definition: thorn; sting; thrust; to prick; to pierce; to stab; to assassinate; to murder

刺中.definition: to hit with a piercing blow

刺五加.definition: manyprickle (Acanthopanax senticosus), root used in TCM

刺兒.definition: a thorn; fig. to ridicule sb; fig. sth wrong

刺兒頭.definition: troublesome person; difficult person to deal with

刺刺不休.definition: to talk incessantly; to chatter on and on

刺探.definition: to pry into; to spy on; to probe into

刺桐.definition: Indian coral tree; sunshine tree; tiger's claw; Erythrina variegata (botany)

刺棱.definition: (onom.) sound of quick movement; Taiwan pr. [ci4leng2]

刺殺.definition: to assassinate; (military) to fight with a bayonet; (baseball) to put out (a baserunner)

刺激.definition: to provoke; to irritate; to upset; to stimulate; to excite; irritant

刺激性.definition: thrilling; exciting; stimulating; irritating; provocative; pungent; spicy

刺痛.definition: to tingle; to sting; to have a sudden sharp pain; (fig.) to hurt deeply; tingle; prick; sting; stab of pain

刺目.definition: gaudy; glaring; unpleasant to the eyes

刺眼.definition: to dazzle; to offend the eyes; dazzling; harsh (light); crude (colors); unsightly

刺穿.definition: to skewer; to impale; to pierce through

刺絲囊.definition: nematocyst; capsule of nettle cells of medusa or anemone

刺絲胞.definition: cnidocyte; nettle cell of medusa or anemone

刺絲胞動物.definition: Cnidaria (animal phylum including jellyfish and sessile polyps)

刺胞動物.definition: Cnidaria (animal phylum including jellyfish and sessile polyps)

刺鼻.definition: to assail the nostrils; acrid; pungent
